original_text: For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof, then your eyes shall be opened, and ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil.
korean_text: 너희가 그것을 먹는 날에는 너희 눈이 밝아져 하나님과 같이 되어 선악을 알 줄 하나님이 아심이니라

sentences.original_text: that in the day ye eat thereof
then your eyes shall be opened
and ye shall be as gods

sentences.korean_translation: 선과 악을 아는 자들이 될 것이라
